author: craigmcc
msg: Add a second method signature for authenticate(), for use when the credentials
are a byte array rather than a String.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct compile error caused by missing "static" modifier.

author: gonzo
msg: fix (again) for request.getParameter() accessing queryString
data - j2ee
costin -
can we possibly keep the request/response re-tooling
your doing out of the j2ee tree? i'm guessing RequestImpl
will disappear someday so i copied the setQueryString()
method to bridge the QueryString and Parameter constructs
vs a super call.
i'm going to try and add some tests for this stuff as
well so that we should feel a bit better about making
request/response changes.
thx,
- james

author: costin
msg: Moved hex conversion code from Ajp11ConnectionHandler to HexUtils.
( to be reused )

author: costin
msg: Changed TcpConnectionHandler interface to allow object recycling.
( with thread reuse ).
Thread reuse is not implemented yet, but it's better to have the right
interface.
